statements: DELETE FROM Collections WHERE collection_amount > 1000 AND collection_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM Debtors WHERE outstanding_balance < 5000 OR debtor_name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM collection_progress WHERE debtor_id = 2002 AND collection_status = 'Pending';
DELETE FROM payment_schedules WHERE payment_date < '2022-09-01' AND payment_amount < 1000;
DELETE FROM payment_schedules WHERE payment_amount > 500 AND payment_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM payment_schedules WHERE payment_status = 'Past Due';
